author: Staff Reporter
text:
P.R.R. Durairajan, AINRC functionary and elder brother of Deputy Speaker T.P.R. Selvam on Friday joined the Congress in the presence of Pradesh Congress Committee president A. Namassivayam and other senior leaders at the party office here.

Mr. Durairajan was with the DMK before joining the AINRC in 2011. He joined the Congress months ahead of the Assembly elections to the Union Territory.

According to a senior Congress leader, a few other functionaries from other parties across the Union Territory had also expressed their willingness to join the party. A PMK functionary and former MLA is expected to join the party on February 22. Accordingly, the last date for submission of application forms by cadres seeking party tickets has been extended till February 21.

The political scene in Puducherry is hotting up with aspirants from Congress, AINRC and the AIADMK lobbying for tickets to contest the forthcoming assembly elections.
title: Durairajan, AINRC functionary, joins Congress
